website_summaries.verdict: The Danalock's many inconsistencies make it less convenient than using an actual key, and therefore, very tough to recommend.
pros: Poly-Control's Bluetooth or Z-Wave-only Danalocks start at just $159, £200 and you can get a Bluetooth and Z-Wave version for $179, £250
cons: The installation was challenging, the app was difficult to navigate, the Bluetooth tech wasn't responsive, I never received an alert and the knock-to-unlock feature didn't work at all

customer_reviews.title: Physically Insecure :(
customer_reviews.text: Returning this - surprised to find that it doesn't accommodate the bolt pattern for my garden variety Schlage deadbolt. Worse yet, though - even if it did, the bolts heads would be snugged down against nothing but a thin piece of plastic. With this installed I'm pretty sure I could just tear the exterior lock off with a small pair of pliers. This is a nice idea but poorly executed, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lock the instruction are almost non existant and everything is made of plastic so unless your lock was installed in the past 2 days the smallest friction in the lock breaks the gears. It happened to me and the seller does not want to take it back. Presuming you can get it to work don't go to far because the plastic baking is what is holding your lock now so anyone with a screw driver or anything similar can rip it out of the door.
customer_reviews.author: pascal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This lock does not work! It’s trash! Do not waste your time! Smh
customer_reviews.author: untameable61

customer_reviews.title: Not a good lock at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm in whole hearted agreement with Carl. Had my Danalock on for two months, and then took it off. Didn't work at all as I expected it to. And the batteries didn't seem to last very long for mine either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea but keeps saying interrupted or auto unlike ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea but keeps saying interrupted or auto unlike want communicate with the lock good thing you can still use your keys works good sometimes
customer_reviews.author: johnny sanders

customer_reviews.title: This lock is aweful. I ordered 2, one ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock is aweful. I ordered 2, one for home, one for work. Replaced the work one immediately, replacement was also junk. Now, I am currently returning the home one. So, I have returned all 3. Very inconsistent. Jams, has many errors. How can anyone use a lock that is not 110% reliable? DO NOT BUY! Spend more money on a nicer unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I have an August smart lock on my front door and wanted something for ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to work. I have an August smart lock on my front door and wanted something for a shed I have. The smart things integration is what drew me to this one, but I definitely regret it. Install was not as easy as the August and after the install I could not get it to work. Lock would not turn and I returned it. Will get the August again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Chip
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth does not connect and does not open. I have to wait long before it connects. I have to open with keys. does not make sense
customer_reviews.author: Krisdebica

customer_reviews.title: So, so.
customer_reviews.text: Big and ugly, but it works. Wife hates its looks, I like it cause I don't carry the front door key and now I have entry from outside. Had to buy new deadbolt as old one would not accept the Danalock. Takes some time to set up and every now and then your phone will not recognize. Haven't figured that one out yet. I just hit "refresh", shut the program and phone off and back on and sooner or later it hooks back up and recognizes lock again. Would not spend the money on another one.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: This is a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad product... It doesn't have enough power to move the lock, and it gets confused about its location
customer_reviews.author: Travis Deason

customer_reviews.title: IOS app much better than Android
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Temperamental and not dependable. IOS app much better than Android. Not ready for prime time. Has sudden, unexpected bursts of repeating locking (which it's not supposed to do) and unlocking on its own. It appears that battery contact comes loose after awhile from repeated door closure (which one expects a door to do: open and close). Good thing to keep a regular key nearby...
customer_reviews.author: JACQUES BENZAKEIN

customer_reviews.title: A few things you should be aware of
customer_reviews.text: - it's black, definitely not antique bronze and easily scratches - faceplate is cheap plastic - took a few of us to figure out how to mount it on the door, not easy but doable - it's difficult to manually rotate, not good for people that have any wrist pain - when you manually rotate it, it rotates in the opposite direction you think it should - it makes using the existing key very difficult (creates resistance) - comes with 4 CR123 batteries, good luck finding those at $4 each when they expire - i recommend downloading the app before buying, you'll get an idea for the quality, or lackthereof
customer_reviews.author: VitaminJ

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews because most of the time I am pleased with the items I order, however, this is not the case with this product. I have tried installing this "smart lock" on a few of my deadbolts with no luck whatsoever. First off, the plastic baseplate provided and pre-cut holes do not last under the weight of this product and will therefore strip. Second, the internal teeth are so closer to the internal parts that the rub up against them and render locking and unlocking completely useless. To sum things up, I have a $100 paperweight and this has been the most dissatisfying product I have bought in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This lock needs a lot of attention to get working and the app is horrible and non responsive. When I wanted it locked it wouldn't, and when I wanted it unlocked it stayed locked. The motor never moved the deadbolt far enough so you have to do everything two or three times but by then the app fails to communicate with the lock. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: shokher99

customer_reviews.title: Works great ... love it
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple, installed in less than 30 minutes and worked immediately. I don't think there is anything on the market that works like this lock and performs so well. Not to mention that lock size is smaller than anything else out there. Works like a charm with my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: steav

customer_reviews.title: Great lock but requires some skill and effort
customer_reviews.text: Installation can be tricky but once it is setup and working with a z-wave hub like smartthings, it works great. If you have the patience and carefully read the instructions, I think it is a good value relative to the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smart Lock!!
customer_reviews.text: Great smart lock, I am using it for work and i like the web portal where you can control all the privileges for users....Perfect for companies that are looking for a smart solution . I already ordered few more for our organization.
customer_reviews.author: Bolon

product_meta.title: Danalock Bluetooth Low Energy Smart Lock, Retrofit Your Existing Deadbolt, Compatible with iOS and Android 4.4, Bronze
product_meta.description: Color Name:BronzeDanalock combines the elegance and minimalism of Scandinavian design - with a bezel in massive anodized aluminum featuring Bluetooth Smart technology. Red/green LED and touch sound signals make the Danalock easy to operate and use. Danalock can be operated by hand, touch button, app or traditional key. Use your smartphone to lock or unlock your door and never fret about a lost key or forgotten door code again. Use Bluetooth Smart to connect via smartphone when in proximity, grant access from anywhere in the world. You can send others limited or unlimited access keys to your home, vacation house, or office while keeping track of who enters and when.
feature_bullets: Invite: send unlimited keys to family, friends, and visitors with either full or limited access
Secure: patented, highest level of encrypted security available
Retrofit: install danalock, inside your home, over your existing deadbolt with everyday tools
Keyless or Key: operate by app, hand, press of a button or use your traditional key.
Monitor: detail log of all lock activities via your smartphone or web browser

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars27 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
